F

formACKPacket(InetAddress, int, int) - Static method in class tftp.TFTP
Forms a ACK packet for the given IP address, port and block number
formDATAPackets(InetAddress, int, String) - Static method in class tftp.TFTP
Given a filename, returns a queue of datagram packets for that file in 512 byte blocks.
formERRORPacket(InetAddress, int, int, String) - Static method in class tftp.TFTP
Forms a ERROR packet given the IP address, port, and details of the error.
formRQPacket(InetAddress, int, Request) - Static method in class tftp.TFTP
Forms a DatagramPacket using Request r with information about request type (read, write, or test), filename, and mode (ascii, octet, etc.).
